宗.definition: school; sect; purpose; model; ancestor; clan; to take as one's model (in academic or artistic work); classifier for batches, items, cases (medical or legal), reservoirs

宗主.definition: head of a clan; natural leader; person of prestige and authority in a domain; suzerain

宗主國.definition: suzerain state; mother country (of a colony)

宗匠.definition: person with remarkable academic or artistic attainments; master craftsman; highly esteemed person

宗喀巴.definition: Tsongkhapa (1357-1419), Tibetan religious leader, founder of the Gelugpa school 格魯派|格鲁派[Ge2 lu3 pai4]

宗室.definition: imperial clan; member of the imperial clan; clansman; ancestral shrine

宗師.definition: great scholar respected for learning and integrity

宗正.definition: Director of the Imperial Clan in imperial China, one of the Nine Ministers 九卿[jiu3 qing1]

宗聖侯.definition: hereditary title bestowed on Confucius' descendants

宗聖公.definition: hereditary title bestowed on Confucius' descendants
